title: Fun. Describe a page of text with 1 adjective.
content:
If you were to use a single adjective to describe a page of text, what do you think some of them would be?

Eg:  
Light  
Dense  
Welcoming  
Disciplined  
Crowded...

 [‹ Help finding a post](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060318/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41839 "Go to previous forum topic") [A new job, Mac vs. PC ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060318/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41701 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Müller

comments.content: About how it looks, NOT the content. Imagine something like a generic MS Word doc
I would think the list of potential adjectives for this purpose would be nearly as long as the list of adjectives altogether.

’Obviously would depend on the page. Still...

Warm  
Refined  
Exquisite  
Beautiful  
Harmonious  
Cheerful

Of course those may not work for a ’generic MS Word doc’. That may more likely be:

Competent  
Clean  
Professional  
Structured...
